official_title: A concurrent resolution recognizing and celebrating the 200th anniversary of the present charter of Columbia University.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress: (1) expresses its appreciation for Columbia College's contributions to the Nation and the people of the United States; (2) recognizes Columbia College's 200th anniversary of excellence in higher education; and (3) congratulates Columbia College.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing and celebrating the 200th anniversary of the present charter of Columbia University.
